metadata.title: CVE-2016-7424 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The put_no_rnd_pixels8_xy2_mmx function in x86/rnd_template.c in libav 11.7and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and crash) via a crafted MP3 file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
